GOOD MORNING.

DETAIL.

OCCUR OVER A PROLONGED PERIOD.
THIS IS QUITE A COMPREHENSIVE AND I HAVE DETAILS PROCESS.

SO YOU'RE FAMILIAR WITH WHAT THE

WHO THE TARGET AUDIENCE IS.
SO I'M NOT GOING TO REVIEW THAT

WITH YOU TODAY.

CAN FIND THE DOCUMENTS ON THE

RECORDS AND NEW

PRACTICES.
PARTICULARLY PATIENTS WITH

FROM DR. STUART MYERBURG FOR

COMPLETED, WE HAVE ADDITIONAL

BUY LOGIC VACCINATION PROGRAM.

AND EXPECT TO INTRODUCE TO THE

SO WITH THAT, I'D LIKE TO ASK

THE REVISIONS THAT ARE UNDER

DISCUSSION TODAY.
>> THANK YOU.

SO TODAY I'M GOING TO COVER
GENERAL RECOMMENDATIONS WORK

GROUP DISCUSSIONS ON TWO

VACCINATION RECORDS.

AND LINE.

TOP.

ENGENDERED A LOT OF SDUNGZ IN

IN THE DRAFT.

TO INFECTION CONTROL AND STERILE
TECHNIQUE, ADDITION OF

INFORMATION ON INTRADURAL ROUTES
AND VACCINATION ROUTES,

INTRAMUSCULAR AND SUBCUTANEOUS.
THERE ARE TWO COMPONENTS TO

INFECTION CONTROL AND STERILE
TECHNIQUE WHICH HAS GENERATED

GROUP.

THE FIRST IS IN THE SECTION
PREPARATION AND TIMELY DISPOSAL.

SO THIS IS ON PAGE 1 OF YOUR --
YOUR TRACKED COPY.

SO PAGE 1, LINE 13 OF YOUR TRACK
COPY, YOU'LL SEE A SECTION.

SO I'LL DISCUSS THAT AND THEN I

CHANGES WE MADE TO THE LANGUAGE
SURROUNDING OCSEA REGULATIONS

WITH RESPECT TO PREVENTING
NEEDLE STICK INJURY.

SO YOU'LL NOTICE ON PAGE 1, LINE
15 THROUGH 22, WE HAVE NEW

LANGUAGE WHICH STATE -- I'LL
READ IT -- VACCINESDRAWN UP IN

AREA NOT ADJACENT TO AREAS WHERE
POTENTIALLY CONTAMINATED ITEMS

ARE PLACED.
MULTI USE VIALS SHOULD BE THE BE

KEPT OR ACCESSED IN THE
IMMEDIATE PATIENT AREA TO

PREVENT AN ADD VETERAN END
CONTAMINATION OF THE VIAL

THROUGH DIRECTOR INDIRECT
CONTACT WITH EQUIPMENT OR

SURFACES THAT COULD LEAD TO
INFECTIONS IN CONSEQUENCE

PATIENTS.
IF A MULTI DOSE VIAL ENTERS THE

IMMEDIATE PATIENT TREATMENT
AREA, IT SHOULD BE DISCARDED

AFTER USE.
.THIS IS INFORMATION THAT IS

ALREADY ON CDC'S WEBSITE.
AS YOU CAN SEE, THE LINK THERE.

BUT IT ALSO HAS NOW BEEN PLACED
INTO THIS GENERAL

RECOMMENDATIONS DRAFT.
ALSO IN THE SECTION ON VACCINE

ADMINISTRATION AND TIMELY
DISPOSE YAG, WE HAVE LANGUAGE

THAT READS IN CERTAIN

VACCINE TYPE IS BEING USED, FOR
EXAMPLE, IN PREPARATION FOR A

COMMUNITY INFLUENZA VACCINATION
CAMPAIGN, BUILDING A SMALL

NUMBER, 10 OR LESS OF SYRINGE
YENS MAY BE CONSIDERED.

THE DOSES SHOULD BE ADMINISTERED
AS SOON AS POSSIBLE AFTER

FILLING BY THE SAME PERSON WHO
FILLED THE SYRINGES.

THIS LANGUAGE IS MARKED IN TRACK
CHANGES IN YOUR DOCUMENT, BUT

THAT REFLECTS AS BEING MOVED
AROUND.

THIS IS CURRENT LONG STANDING
GENERAL RECOMMENDATIONS LANGUAGE

AND, THEREFORE, CDC GUIDANCE AS
WELL AS A COMMON TRAINING

THAT CDC USING AND
APPEARS TO REALLY STANDARD

ADMINISTRATION PRACTICES.
THESE TWO SECTIONS TAKEN

TOGETHER ENGENDER A LOT OF

THEY HAD A CHANCE TO SEE THE
SLIDE SET AND THEY SAW THE

DRAFT.
AND ALREADY THERE'S BEEN A LOT

OF DISCUSSION IN THE WORK GROUP
ON THIS.

AND I WANTED TO MAKE SOME
SUMMARY POINTS AND EXPLAIN KIND

OF WHY THIS HAS BEEN SUCH A
INTERESTING ISSUE.

IT HAS TO DO BASICALLY WITH MASS
CLINICES AND HOW TO APPLY THESE

TWO CONCEPTS TOGETHER IN A MASS
CLINIC.

ON THE ONE HAND, YOU WANT TO
MAKE SURE THAT YOUR MULTI DOSE

VIALS ARE FREE OF CONTAMINATION.
YOU DON'T WANT THEM OPENED NEAR

A PATIENT.
SO THERE HAS TO BE SOME DISTANCE

BETWEEN THE PATIENT AND THE
STORAGE FACILITY OR THE AREA

WHERE THE SYRINGES ARE GOING TO
BE FILLED.

AND WE ALSO HAVE A
RECOMMENDATION THAT THE SAME

PERSON THAT FILLS THE SYRINGE
MAY NEED TO ADMINISTER IT.

SO THERE'S GOING TO BE SOME
ROTATION OF STAFF, SOME

FEASIBILITY ISSUES THAT'S GOING
THE TO BE INEFFICIENT.

MANY PEOPLE HAVE SAID THAT.
A

AND, OF COURSE, THE LANGUAGE
ABOUT DISCARDED DOSES LEAD TO

QUESTIONS ABOUT WASTE.
SO THIS IS BASED ON CDC GUIDANCE

ALREADY ON THE WEBSITE.
IT'S BEEN ON THERE A WHILE AND

HAS THE TASK OF ADDRESSING

INJECTIONS PRACTICES.
IT IS TRUE THAT THAT IS A

SO THIS IS SOMETHING THAT WE'VE

PLACED INTO THE GENERAL RECS, AS
WELL.

IT'S VERY, VERY STRICT GUIDANCE
WITH ALL THE USE OF MULTI DOSE

VIALS.

AT A DISTANCE FROM THE PATIENT,

SO WE WANTED TO HAVE THAT AS A

ALLOWANCE ABOUT 10 PREFILLED

SYRINGES, MANUFACTURING OF
PREFILLED SYRINGES ARE

PREFERRED, BUT THE END USER CAN
PREFILL TEN SYRINGES, 10 AT A

TIME, PERHAPS FROM ONE MOOI
MULTI DOSE VIAL ONLY.

AND BRING THAT TO THE
ADMINISTRATION AREA.

THE OTHER ASPECT I WANTED TO
SHARE WE'RE DEFINING SAME DAY AS

SAME CLINIC DAY.
SO THAT'S KIND OF NEW IN THIS

SECTION.
THE OTHER ASPECT OF TIMELY

PREPARATION AND TIMELY DISPOSAL
INVOLVES CHANGES THAT WE MADE

WITH RESPECT TO SAFETY.
AND WE WANTED TO DO THIS TO KIND

OF REMOVE WHAT PREVIOUSLY
EXISTED IN THE 2011 RECS.

THE RECOMMENDATION IN THE SAME
PLACE.

THE STRONG SIDE WAS THE
STATEMENT THESE FEDERAL -- THIS

HAS USE AND THIS REFERS TO THE
NEED TO NOT ONLY MAKE SURE THAT

NEEDLES ARE NOT BEING RECAPPED
OR THEY'RE NOT BEING REMOVED,

THAT IT'S SPECIFICALLY THOSE
ENGINEERED TO BE SAFE, ALL OF

THIS LANGUAGE COMES FROM THE
REGULATIONS AND IN THE PREVIOUS

RECOMMENDATIONS STATED THAT
THESE FEDERAL REGULATIONS

REQUIRE THE INJECTION DEVICES,
NEEDLE SYRINGES OR NEEDLE

INJECTORS BE USED FOR INJECTABLE
VACCINATIONS IN CLINIC SETTINGS.

THAT'S ON PAGE 4 LINE 6 OF YOUR
CURRENT TRACK DRAFT.

THAT WAS THE STRONG SIDE.
NOW STRUCK OUT.

A THE PREPARATION HOME
STATEMENT, SAFETY ENGINEERED

SYRINGES OR NEEDLE TYPE
INJECTIONS ARE PREFERRED AND

SHOULD BE ENCOURAGED TO REDUCE
RISK FOR INJURY.

WE TOOK THAT OUT AND THAT'S
ANOTHER THING THAT WE'VE TALKED

ABOUT IN THE CHANGED AND GENERAL
RECS.

TOPIC IS WE WITH THE

DERMAL CELLS, THERE WAS NOTHING

ORAL ADMINISTRATION AND
INTERNASAL ADMINISTRATION OF

VACCINES.
SO THAT'S ALL IN THERE NOW,

INCLUDING THE NEW SECTION ON
INTRA DERMAL VACCINATION.

AND WE'VE ADDED SOME LANGUAGE TO

MANUFACTURER IN A STATE THAT
INTRA DETERMINAN INFLUENZA

VACCINE OF SOMEONE -- THAT
SHOULD SAY NINE.

I TOOK THAT OUT.
I'M SORRY, I HAD TO MAKE SOME

DOSE ON THE PREMGZ THAT THEIR

AND THAT 6 SHOULD NOT BE IN

THICKNESS.
IMMUNIZATION ADMINISTRATION

TOPIC, WE MADE A CHANGE TO THE

AND OLDER.

THE SPECIFIC INJECTION SITE.

BASED ON TWO PUBLICATIONS, THIS

LIKE.

THE TWO PUBLICATIONS THAT HAVE

MRS. JACKSON AND AMY MIDDLEMAN,

USE OF THESE VACCINES FOR THE

CLINICAL IMPLICATIONS OF
NONSTANDARD VACCINATION

PRACTICES.
AND IN YOUR DRAFT, THIS IS ON

COPY.

AND I BASICALLY WANT TO GET SOME
BACKGROUND ON THIS.

AS YOU KNOW, WE DO NOT RECOMMEND
CHANGING ROUTE OF THE

ADMINISTRATION.
BUT WE DO MAKES SOME VACCINE

SPECIFIC RECOMMENDATIONS WITH
RESPECT TO WHETHER WE COUNT THE

DOSE OR NOT.
AND WE MAKE A SPECIFIC

RECOMMENDATION IN A 2011 GENERAL
RECS THAT STATES HELP TITUS B

ADMINISTERED BY ANY ROUTE OTHER
THAN INTRA MUSCULAR SHOULD NOT

BE COUNTED AS VALID AND SHOULD
BE REPEATED.

WE ADDRESSED THIS SOMEWHAT WITH
WE ADDRESSED PERSONS WITH

BLEEDING DISORDERS.
WE REAFFIRMED THAT WE WANTED TO

GIVE DISCRETION TO PROVIDERS IF
THEY DON'T FEEL COMFORTABLE

ABOUT THE BLEEDING RISKS THAT
THEY CAN, IN FACT, ADMINISTER A

VACCINE OR RATHER THAT THEY HAD
THE OPTION, I GUESS, AS WERE IT

HERE OF NOT VACCINATING INTRA
MUSCULARLY.

WE SHOULD SAY SHOULD ADMINISTER
INTRA MUSCULARLY IF A PATIENT

FAMILIAR WITH THE BLEEDING RISK
CAN BE ADMINISTERED BY THIS

ROUTE WITH REASONABLE SAFETY.
THIS IS IN A SPECIAL SITUATION

SECTION.
SHARED WITH ACIP AT THE FEBRUARY

MEETING.
THIS RAISES THE QUESTION DO

PERSONS WITH HEMOPHILIA NEED TO
BE REPEATED?

AND THIS HAS LED TO
COLLABORATIONS TO THE

VACCINATION OF THE IMMUNIZATION
SAFETY OFFICE WITH OTHER VACCINE

SPECIFIC GROUPS, SPECIFICALLY
THE HEPATITIS B VACCINE SUBJECT

MATTER EXPERT.
THERE ARE ACTUALLY SOME ISSUES

WITH HUMAN PAPILLOMAVIRUS
VACCINE ON THIS ISSUE, AS WELL.

SO THERE'S BEEN A LOT OF
DISCUSSION.

THE 2011 GENERAL RECS VACCINE
SUGGESTION ALLOWS SUBJU

INVESTIGATION BASED ON
IMMUNOGENICITY STUDIES DONE IN

2006 WHEN THE CONJUGATE VACCINE
CAME OUT, IT WAS IN ADDITION TO

THE POLYSACCHARIDE VACCINE.
A LOT OF AREAS OCCURRED.

WE DID THIS STUDY.
SHOWED THAT YOU CAN, IN FACT,

ADMINISTER THIS VACCINE
SUBCUTANEOUSLY.

BUT THE SUBJECT WAS SILENT ON
OTHER VACCINES.

WE FOUND DATA ON HEPATITIS A.
SO WE ADDED THAT AS AS VACCINE

TO MENINGOCOCCAL CON CONJUGATE
VACCINE.

HOWEVER, FOR OT VACCINES, WE
HAVE NOT REACHED A POINT WHERE

WE HAVE ENOUGH EVIDENCE OR WE
THINK WE CAN ADD IT TO THE LIST

WITH HEPATITIS AMINIG.
HUMAN PAPILLOMAVIRUS IT STAYS

INTRA MUSCULAR ADMINISTRATION.
THERE'S BEEN A LOT OF GUIDANCE

GIVEN THAT COUNT
SUBCUTANEOUS DOSING OF HUMAN PAP

LOW V
PAPILLOMAVIRUS.

THEN THERE ARE ONGOING
DISCUSSION TOES CONDUCT STUDIES

WITH THE NATIONAL CENTER FOR
DEVELOPMENTAL -- FOR FIRST

EFFECT NECESSARY DEVELOPMENTAL
DISORDERS TO LOOK AT

WITH HEMOPHILIA AND THEIR
RESPONSE.

THEIR IMMUNOLOGY IMMUNEIC
RESPONSE.

IT'S COMMON PRACTICE FOR
PROVIDEDERS TO ADMINISTER THE

DOSE SUBCUTANEOUSLY.
IT'S ON THE ORDER OF

THESE STUDIES ARE UNDER WAY.
AS YOU'LL SEE FROM YOUR DRAFT,

WE LIST APPETITIS A, WE LIST MA
THING CAUCUS, BUT WE DON'T MAKE

OTHER CHANGES FOR THE OTHER
VACCINES.

BUT I WANTED TO SHARE THAT
ONGOING DISCUSSION.

NOW SHIFT TO YOUR VACCINATION
RECORDS HAND OUT.

AND I DON'T HAVE A LOT TO SAY
HERE BEFORE HANDING THE MIKE

OVER TO STUART.
BUT I WANT TO TALK ABOUT A

COUPLE OF CHANGES.
FIRST OF ALL, WITH RESPECT TO

THE PROVIDER SECTION, WE WANTED
TO ADD SOME LANGUAGE WHICH IS

PROBABLY OVERDUE THAT CLARIFIES
WHICH SPECIFIC VACCINES ARE

COVERED BY THE VACCINATION
PROGRAM.

AND SO WE ADDED THIS FOLLOWING
LANGUAGE, THIS ACT APPLIES FOR

ANY VACCINE TO WHICH THERE IS A
ROUTINE RECOMMENDATION FOR

CHILDHOOD VACCINATION WHETHER
ADMINISTERED TO CHILD OR ADULTS.

EVEN IF MANY OR MOST DOSES OF
THE VACCINE ARE ADMINISTERED TO

ADULTS.
FOR EXAMPLE, INFLUENZA VACCINE

OF THE VACCINATION RECORDS
SECTION.

THIS IS, OF COURSE, RELEVANT
BECAUSE THERE ARE SPECIFIC

RECORDING REQUIREMENTS FOR THE
NATIONAL VACCINE INJURY

COMPENSATION ACT.
WHAT DATE THE VACCINE WAS

ADMINISTERS, VACCINE
MANUFACTURER, VACCINE LOT

NUMBER, NAME, ADDRESS AND TITLE
OF THE PERSON ADMINISTERING THE

VACCINE.
WHAT I DIDN'T PLACE ON THIS

SLIDE ALSO IN THE LAW IS THE
DATE OF THE VIS ADMINISTRATION

AND THE FACT THAT THE VIS WAS
GIVEN.

SO THOSE ARE SPECIFIC RECORDING
REQUIREMENTS OF THE ACT AND WE

WANT TO CLARIFY BECAUSE, OF
COURSE, FOR INSTANCE, INFLUENZA

VACCINE IS A VACCINE THAT WE
USED TO THINK OF TRADITIONALLY

AS AN ADULT VACCINE.
BUT NOW, OF COURSE, THERE IS A

RECOMMENDATION TO ADMINISTER THE
VACCINE TO CHILDREN, SO IT OF

COURSE IS COVERED BY THIS ACT.
SO BASICALLY LANGUAGE TO CLARIFY

THAT.
>>> ALSO IN VACCINATION RECORDS

IN THE HEADING ON IMMUNIZATION
INFORMATION SYSTEMS, WE HAVE

PLACED NEW LANGUAGE WHICH YOU
CAN LOOK AT IN THE DRAFT THAT

HIGHLIGHTS WHAT FUNCTIONS ARE
CARRIED OUT BY AN IMMUNIZATION

INFORMATION OR IIF.
THE FOLLOWING EXHIBITED ON THE

SLIDE, PAGE 2 LION 17 OF YOUR
DRAFT, I.S. CAN PREVENT DUPE CAT

VACCINATI
VACCINATIONS, LIMB NISED

APPOINTMENTS, ALLOW RECALL FOR
THOSE WHO MISSED APPOINTMENTS,

DETERMINE WHEN VACCINES NEED TO
BE REPEATED, WHICH IS AKIN TO, I

THINK, LANGUAGE THAT WILL BECOME
MORE .MORE FAMILIAR WITH.

WE CALL THAT EVALUATION.
REDUCE VACCINE WASTE AND REDUCE

STAFF TIME REQUIRED TO PRODUCE
OR LOCATE VACCINATION RECORDS OR

CERTIFICATES.
SO WHAT IS NEW TO THE DRAFTS

THIS YEAR IS THIS PARTICULAR
LANGUAGE ABOUT FORECASTING WHEN

THE NEXT DOSE IS DUE, ALLOWING
RECALL FOR THOSE WHO MISSED

APPOINTMENTS AND DETERMINING
WHEN VACCINES NEED TO BE

REPEATED OR EVALUATION.
SO THOSE ARE THE NEW TERMS.

AND WE ALSO PLACED LANGUAGE INTO
THE DRAFTS ON LINE 19 OF PAGE 2,

A STATEMENT THAT IIF SHOULD
MAINTAIN INTEROPERABILITY WITH

OTHER ELECTRONIC HEALTH RECORD
TOOLS AS PART OF AN EFFORT TO

IMPROVE THE QUALITY OF CARE,
REDUCE HEALTH DISPARITIES,

ENGAGE PATIENT EBBS AND FAMILIES
IN THEIR HEALTH, IMPROVE THE

COORDINATION OF CARE, IMPROVE
POPULATION HEALTH AND ENSURE

ADEQUATE POLICY AND SECURITY
POLICY FOR PERSONAL INFORMATION.

AND THE REFERENCE FOR THIS IS
ALSO ON CDC'S WEBSITE.

WE IMAGINE THAT, YOU KNOW,
DEPENDING ON THE DURATION OF THE

PROCESS FOR PUBLISHING, THE
GENERAL RECOMMENDATIONS, WE

MIGHT MAKE FURTHER CHANGES,
PERHAPS GET MORE SPECIFIC WITH

DIFFERENT PHASES THAT HAVE
OCCURRED, BUT FOR THE MOST PART,

WE HAVEN'T GOT INTO THAT JUST
YET.

THINK OF THAT AS PLACE HOLDER
INFORMATION, BUT RIGHT NOW, THIS

IS KIND OF OUR REFERENCE TO KIND
OF INTEROPERABILITY WITH THE

ELECTRONIC HEALTH RECORD.
AND HARKENS BACK TO THE

MEANINGFUL USE WEBSITE.
AND SO BASED ON THE BULLET

POINTS THAT I GAVE YOU FOR IIS
IS I WANTED TO NOW TURN THE MIKE

OVER TO STUART MYERBURG.
HE'S GOING TO BE DISCUSSING A

CLINICAL DECISION SUPPORT TOOL
FOR IMMUNIZATIONS, ALSO KNOWN AS

CDSI.
YOU SHOULD HAVE -- ACIP MEMBERS

SHOULD HAVE A COPY OF A PAMPHLET
THAT HIGHLIGHT THESE PROJECT.

AND I WILL HAPPILY TURN THE MIC
OVER TO STUART.

THEN WE'LL TAKE QUESTIONS ON
BOTH SECTIONS ALTOGETHER WITH

THAT AFTERWARDS.
>>> THANKS, ANDREW.

I'LL BE GIVING A VERY HIGH LEVEL
OVERVIEW FOR OUR CLINICAL

POSITIONS PROJECT.
THE PAMPHLET THAT ANDREW

MENTIONED THAT YOU HAVE GOES
INTO A LITTLE BIT MORE DETAIL

ABOUT IT.
SO WE'RE TALKING ABOUT THE

BACKGROUND OF THE PROJECT.
AND THEN WHAT OUR RESULTS WERE

AND WHAT OUR NEXT STEPS ARE.
SO THE FIRST THING, WHAT DO WE

MEAN BY CLINICAL PHYSICIAN
SUPPORT?

IT'S MORE COMMONLY REFERRED TO
AS VACCINE -- IN THE VACCINE

COMMUNITY.
THAT FUNCTION IS PERFORMED BY

MANY DIFFERENT COMPUTER SYSTEMS,
ELECTRONIC HEALTH RECORDS,

INFORMATION SYSTEMS AND ALSO
STAND ALONE APPLICATIONS, LIKE

WEB BASED SCHEDULERS, SMARTPHONE
APPS AND THINGS LIKE THAT.

THE REASON WE HAVE THIS PROJECT
IS BECAUSE OF THAT.

ACIP INTEGRATION INTO COMPUTER
SYSTEMS IS CHALLENGING.

THE SCHEDULE IS COMMUNICATED FOR
HUMANS TO READ.

BUT, OBVIOUSLY, COMPUTER SYSTEMS
CAN'T READ A NARRATIVE OR A

SCHEDULE.
SO THOSE RECOMMENDATIONS ARE

THEN TAKEN BY SUBJECT MATTER
EXPERTS AND TECHNICAL PEOPLE WHO

ARE DEVELOPING THE COMPUTER
SYSTEMS AND THEY INTERPRET IT

AND TRY TO CODE OFF OF THAT.
THAT CAN BE VERY TIME CONSUMING

AND IT'S HAPPENING
INDEPENDENTLY, SO THERE CAN BE

VARIABILITY.
SO THE OUTPUT FROM THESE

EVALUATIONS FORECASTING SYSTEMS
CAN VARY WIDELY.

AND THE RESULTS DON'T ALWAYS
MATCH THE RESULTS THAT CLINICAL

EXPERTS EXPECT OR WHAT YOU WOULD
EXPECT IF YOU READ THE ACIP

RECOMMENDATIONS.
THIS IS REALLY BECAUSE EACH ONE

IS TRYING TO DEVELOP THE CODING
OFF THE LANGUAGE AND MAKING

THEIR OWN INTERPRETATIONS.
A 2009 STUDY BY THE INFORMATION

SYSTEM SUPPORT BRANCH SHOWS THAT
THERE WAS AMBIGUITY IN THEIR

INTERPRETATIONS.
36 ALGORITHMS FROM FORECASTING

SYSTEMS WERE LOOKED AT.
NINE TEST CASES WERE RUN AGAINST

THOSE.
AND THE RESULTS SHOWED THAT 19

OF THOSE 36 SYSTEMS OR 53%
FORECAST THE NEXT DOSE FIVE DAYS

OR GREATER THAN THE MINIMUM AGE.
SO ONE OBVIOUSLY, THERE WAS SOME

VARIABILITY.
AND, OF COURSE, THE REASON FOR

THAT IS, AS WE ALL KNOW, THE
IMMUNIZATION SCHEDULE IS

COMPLEX.
THE SCHEDULE CHANGES FREQUENTLY.

AND AS I SAID BEFORE, THESE
COMPUTER SYSTEMS ARE

DECENTRALIZED.
THEY'RE NOT SHARING ANY SORT OF

COMMON TECHNOLOGY OR LOGIC
FRAMEWORK.

SO EVEN IF A SYSTEM IS
INTERPRETING THE RECOMMENDATIONS

CORRECTLY, IT CAN OFTEN BE VERY
SPECIFIC TO JUST THAT GIVEN

APPLICATION.
AND SO THERE'S NO SHARING OF

THAT INFORMATION.
SO IF ONE SYSTEM IS DOING IT

CORRECTLY, IT DOESN'T MEAN ANY
OF THE OTHER SYSTEMS ARE.

SO, OF COURSE, THERE'S DISPARITY
AS A RESULT OF THAT.

AS I SAID BEFORE, THE LOGIC THAT
IS CREATED FOR THE SYSTEMS IS

REALLY BASED ON HUMAN OR HUMANS
LOOKING AT THE SCHEDULE AND

TRYING TO INTERPRET IT AND MAKE
IT INTO CODE.

ALSO, THERE'S REALLY NO
CONSENSUS ON HOW TO REPRESENT

THESE LOGIC FOR COMPUTER
SYSTEMS.

AND MANY OF THE STANDARDS THAT
ARE BEING USED ARE VERY

PROPRIETARY.
SO AS A RESULT, WE STARTED THIS

PROJECT.
AND THE CLINICAL DECISIONS FOR

IMMUNIZATION PROJECT WAS MEANT
TO BRIDGE THAT GAP BETWEEN THE

ACIP RECOMMENDATIONS THAT ARE
PUBLISHED IN SCIENTIFIC LANGUAGE

AND HUMAN READABLE AND THE I.T.
WORLD OF COMPUTER SYSTEMS.

WHAT WE WANTED TO DO WAS CREATE
SOMETHING THAT COULD BE USED BY

ALL OF THESE SYSTEMS.
WE RECOGNIZE THERE IS

VARIABILITY IN TOOLS BEING USED,
CODES BEING USED BY THESE SMGS.

SO WE DIDN'T WANT TO CREATE A
TOOL.

WE ALSO DIDN'T WANT TO CREATE
ANYTHING THAT WAS PROPRIETARY.

SO WHAT THIS IS JUST A WAY FOR
ANY SOFTWARE SYSTEM TO BE ABLE

TO TAKE THE LOGIC AND MOVE IT
INTO THEIR SYSTEM.

SO HOPEFULLY THAT WOULD PROMOTE
CONSISTENT INTERPRETATION OF

ACIP RECOMMENDATIONS ACROSS
THESE COMPUTER SYSTEMS.

AND, OF COURSE, THE ULTIMATE
GOAL IS TO ENSURE THAT A

PATIENT'S IMMUNIZATION STATUS IS
CURRENT, ACCURATE AND

CONSISTENT.
SO AS I SAID BEFORE, THE

PROBLEMS WERE REALLY VARENCE,
COMPLEXITY AND DISPARITY.

AND SO OUR GOALS WERE TO ADDRESS
THE VARIANCE, TO DOCUMENT THE
